The user is also able to search by name through input form',buttonLabel:'Sign Up Now',imgStart:'start',img:'images/empDir.png',alt:'Employee Directory',gitLink:"https://github.com/Devante05/employeeDirectory",liveLink:"https://the-employees-directory.herokuapp.com/"};

sourcesContent:
export const homeObjOne = {
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'Fullstack CRUD',
    headline: 'Follow my Fitness',
    description:
      'Follow my Fitness is a fitness application that a team of developers and I created to have users log and share workouts as well as BMI and fitness goals. The application uses materialize and handlebars as front end frameworks to style the page and render template data. We were able to set up the server using Node.js and Javascript. Our user data is populated to our mySQL database using the sequelize npm package.',
    buttonLabel: 'Shop Now',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/Fmf.png',
    alt: 'Follow my Fitness',
    gitLink: "https://github.com/carpegavin/Follow-My-Fitness",
    liveLink: "https://follow-my-fitness.herokuapp.com/"
  };
  
  export const homeObjTwo = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'CLI Automation',
    headline: 'Team Profile Generator',
    description:
      'Team Profile Generator is a CLI where the user can input any number of team members, and they may be a mix of engineers and interns. The user will input Position, Name, ID, email, and office number for each employee. When the user has completed building the team, the application will create an HTML file that displays a nicely formatted team roster based on the information provided by the user.',
    buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/teamProGen.png',
    alt: 'Team profile generator',
    gitLink: "https://github.com/Devante05/TeamProfile-Generator",
    liveLink: ""
  };
  
  export const homeObjThree = {
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'Caching Application',
    headline: 'Offline Budget Tracker',
    description:
      "The offline budget tracker is an application I created so the user can conveniently balance their budget using my technology without internet connection. The user is able to record withdrawals and deposits which are then displayed on a line graph. Using local caching, I am able to save their transactions locally until they are able to connect to the internet again. When the user has an internet connection the data saved is sent to a mongoDB database.",
    buttonLabel: 'Start Now',
    imgStart: 'start',
    img: 'images/budgetTrack.png',
    alt: "Budget tracker",
    gitLink: "https://github.com/Devante05/budgettracker",
    liveLink: "https://thebudget-tracking-app.herokuapp.com/"
  };
  
  export const homeObjFour = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'React',
    headline: 'User Directory',
    description:
      'The User Directory was created to sort through a given set of individuals using React as a frontend. The application uses a third party api to pull 50 random individuals from around the world. The user is then able to sort through the given individuals alphabetically or un-alphabetically by first-name, last-name, email, and country. The user is also able to search by name through input form',
    buttonLabel: 'Sign Up Now',
    imgStart: 'start',
    img: 'images/empDir.png',
    alt: 'Employee Directory',
    gitLink: "https://github.com/Devante05/employeeDirectory",
    liveLink: "https://the-employees-directory.herokuapp.com/"
  };
